properties.name: China Buffet
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast For those of you who crave China Buffet. Decent selection and friendly staff! Goes for a plate for dinner.

properties.name: CineMagic Menomonie Stadium 7 Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast Stadium style seating and all the amenities of your common big time cinema. Salty popcorn, lots of milkduds and the biggest flicks are all here! Check out their website for current movies and showtimes

properties.name: Devils Punchbowl
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast Often referred to as Wisconsin\'s Grand Canyon, the Devils Punchbowl Co Park holds a special place in the heart of Stoutonians. It is a popular place during the fall and spring times when fall colors are blooming and the Wisconsin snow pack is melting away. But don\'t forget to check out the AMAZING ice formations the punch bowl has to offer during the winter months as the natural springs freeze. The best way to get there is to go west on Highway 29 across the Red Cedar River. Turn left onto County P for a couple of hundred yards. Turn left onto Paradise Valley Road for about 2 miles. There is a small parking lot on the left side of the road. This location is a true Stout gem!

properties.name: Dunn County Family Planning
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast 800 Wilson Avenue Menomonie WI 54751Dunn County Family Planning is on the lower level of the government center. Visit their website for more information.

properties.name: Dunn County Ice Arena
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast Here you can find open skating during the week, and watch Stout Men\'s and Women\'s hockey here! Be sure to come early to the Men\'s game and tailgate in the parking lot!

properties.name: Fleet Feet
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast 316 Main St Menomonie WI 54751Ever see a student wearing an awesome hoodie, only you cannot find it in the UW-Stout Bookstore!? Check out Fleet Feet for great UW-Stout and Menomonie High School hoodies, t-shirts and hats!

properties.name: Fortune Cookie Chinese Dine-In & Take-Out
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast Fortune Cookie is a Chinese dine-in and take out establishment right within the north campus community. It can be found right across from the UW-Stout Alumni Foundation house along Broadway. Their food is pretty good, but also pretty Americanized. It\'s not authentic by any means and their delivery charge is pretty steep and be aware THEY ONLY ACCEPT CASH! No Stout card accepted here! Worth a look though.

properties.name: Jeff's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast 145 E Main St menomonie wi 54751Jeff\'s Pizza, formerly known as Jeff and Jim\'s Pizza is truly a staple in UW-Stout tradition! Best known for their \'smotherella sticks\' and gigantic 20" pizza\'s, Jeff\'s Pizza demographic IS college students! Cheap & good, that\'s their recipe! I recommend the Manjare Rolls! Jeff\'s version of hot pockets! A must to stop at and eat while in Menomonie!

properties.name: Log Jam
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast Log Jam truly is a popular place in the downtown Menomonie area. It is a place to be seen at on Thursday or Saturday night! Log Jam has a very nice atmosphere once inside, a bit more sophisticated than other establishments in the area. Plenty of large wooden booth seats for you and your friends to enjoy a drink. They also have flat panel televisions near the bar to watch the big game. Log Jam is for those students who enjoy getting dressed up for a casual drink with friends. Don\'t forget the all-you-can-eat .99 BBQ ribs on Thursday and all-you-can-eat fish fry on Friday. Log Jam has a very fine dining menu, although slightly more expensive than other establishments. Certainly worth checking out!

properties.name: Parker's Tuscan Grill
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast 1919 Stout rd Menomonie wi 54751Parker\'s Tuscan Grill is a fantastic place to eat when you want to get away from greasy bar food and pizza! Most plates run around here and are very tasty. Shhhhh, you can also find the Stout Men\'s Hockey team, coaching staff and their fans here after home games :-)

properties.name: State Cinema Dinner Theater
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast A student kind of theater! You won\'t find blockbusters here on opening night, but you will find recent movies with a cheap ticket! This is a DINNER THEATER and you can enjoy Pizza, Burgers, Nachos Hot dogs, Brats, Spaghetti & Meatballs, Cheeseburger with bacon, French Fries, Pop/Shakes and Tacos! If your looking for a unique and CHEAP dining option, this is it! Matinee price is .50 and regular price evening tickets go for .00

properties.name: Teds Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast 306 E. Main St Menomonie wi 54751Ah yes! Ted\'s Pizza is a favorite among UW-Stout students! Great pizza that is a staple in the college diet! Everyone needs a little Ted\'s!

properties.name: The Bottoms
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast The Dunnville Bottoms are a special place for so many people! The Bottoms are a place where Stoutonians play frisbee, have picnics, go swimming and in general have a good time on the sand dunes! The railroad track depicted on this map is now a dirt road, this is the road you take to get to The Bottoms! Plenty of beach space to lay out and enjoy some UV rays or have a raging bonfire. The tradition that is set in stone here is if your a student and goto the Bottoms, you have to jump off the railroad bridge that crosses the river. ***DISCLAIMER, Stout Media does not encourage bridge jumping, this activity is very dangerous. ***

properties.name: The Great Escape Bar & Grill - VFW
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast 2909 Bongey Dr Menomonie WI 54751Most commonly known as the \'VFW\' among students, the Great Escape Bar and Grill is known for its Wednesday Wing night, all you can eat wings for .50! You heard that right, all you can eat! They have original buffalo and sweet-n-sassy sauces for their wings. They also have a great fish fry and make a mean burger as well, I recommend the Sparky burger! All in all this is a hot spot for Stout students to enjoy a good cheap meal!

properties.name: Waterfront Bar & Grill
properties.description: Posted by Uwstoutcast The Waterfront Bar & Grill is known for tasty Bloody Mary\'s, Wednesday night buffalo wings and great entertainment. A great place to check out bands on Thursday nights, sometimes crowds can reach over 100 people. It is the \'unofficial\' yet \'official\' home of the UW-Stout water-ski team! They have an amazing view of Lake Menomin off their very spacious back deck, including stairs leading right down to the dock!
